parameters.componentSubtitle: A classic modal overlay, in which you can include any content you want

description.component: The modal structure is very simple: `modal`: the main container, `modal-background`: a transparent overlay that can act as a click target to close the modal, `modal-content`: a horizontally and vertically centered container, with a maximum width of 640px, in which you can include any content and `modal-close`: a simple cross located in the top right corner.
